name: FlashLight (itch)
description:
You are being chased by monsters that are attracted to light. If your torch is off you cannot see but the monsters wont move. The brighter the torch, the more you see but the faster the monsters move. You need to kill the monsters and survive for the longest.

Controls:
Movement - WASD
Torch On/off - Right mouse button
Torch brightness - Scroll wheel
Shoot - right mouse button

This is my first game ever written in unity for the Ludum Dare 40 game jam
